column4: i'm getting extremely poor video performance on my laptop, I'm trying to use the radeon open source driver on a thinkpad t41, (radeon 9000 mobile.... M9, R250) glxinfo output is here:http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/28016/  it seems that its using mesa3d?  is that right?
you con use the fglrx driver i think
but I want to use the free one, from what I understand it works better with power management on this laptop
they got a guide on ubuntuguide.org i think
